alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 8:33PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Cass and Richland Counties. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. Maple River near Enderlin affecting Cass and Ransom Counties. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, MAJOR FLOOD. Approximate stage where flooding begins in areas along the Sheyenne River north of the diversion channel to Harwood, ND. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning and continue rising to a crest of 22.0 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
